data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary: On average, 95 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,651,200 people living in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Tajik people. Make the Tajik people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, encourage the 34,414 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
